meanings.definition: The small triangular bone at the base of the spinal column in humans, consisting of several fused rudimentary vertebrae.
meanings.sent1: Sitting on a hard surface for a long time can put pressure on your coccyx.
meanings.sent2: After falling on the ice, she felt pain in her coccyx.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that he must have broken his coccyx from sitting too much.
meanings.sent4: Her coccyx felt like a tiny anchor, keeping her grounded during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The coccyx is sometimes called the tailbone because of its location at the base of the spine.
